name: Kill the Little Dudes
overview: Action platform game involving collecting pods, little dudes and death.We play as an Arnie-type hero, who can jump on platforms and shoot enemies. If you kill them they respawn, so timing is critical. You must collect all the orbs on a level, and after a few you find a bonus stage. For an AMOS game its good fun for a while, and the controls/ladder climbing ability are just about sharp enough for early levels. On later levels, new enemies are introduced; which means it gets a lot more difficult, and some later levels feel a bit unfair.
